set_applicant.label: Amongst these individuals, which one are you?

checks_list.title: Help us run necessary verifications
checks_list.description:
Submit supporting documents.


Please provide us with the following documents to help us verify your profile.
Our team will keep you informed of the result of the verification.


Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us
checks_list.all_checks_submitted: Thank you, your checks are being reviewed.

under_review.title: Under review
under_review.description:
Our team is now reviewing your information.
We will keep you informed as soon as possible.

id_verification.title: Proof of identity
id_verification.callout:
Identity document (passport or ID card) must be valid.

For storage in Singapore, Toronto and New York, a passport is required.


Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

proof_of_address.title: Proof of address
proof_of_address.callout:
Proof of address (utility bill) must be less than 3 months old.

Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.


Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

articles_of_association.title: Memorandum of association
articles_of_association.callout:
Memorandum of association (MoA) must be valid.

Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.

bank_details.title: Bank identity statement
bank_details.callout:
Bank identity statement (banking details) must be less than 3 months old.

Bank account verification ensures, by means of an official document from your bank, that you are the holder of the account used for your buying and selling transactions.

Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.


Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

registration_certificate.title: Registration certificate
registration_certificate.callout:
Registration certificate must be less than 3 months old.

Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.


Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us
